column5: Looking for anyone that has been there. My wife and I are scheduled for next July and want an idea of what to bring/use for walleyes and expectations. Thanks in advance

fishing should be good. find the inflow to the lake. ask the group in front of you if they are getting on the plane as you get off. big lake, crawler harnesses untill you find them then switch to jigs if they are stacked up. keep an eye out for wildlife , has potential to see moose and even the woodland caribou
